author: Lon.TV
description:
Buy one on Amazon: https://lon.tv/shuoa (compensated affiliate link) - The ADTH USB ATSC 3 TV tuner is being marketed by broadcasters as the low cost solution for DRM woes. It supposedly works with Android and Fire TV devices but I found DRM compatibility was severely lacking. See more tuning options: https://www.youtube.com/playlist?list=PLCZHp4d1HnItrNhXon_xcr_kpgLM57j3D and subscribe! http://lon.tv/s
